Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2010 05:22PM chyandqt wrote: Good morning all! Just about finished up radation treatments. After 6 1/2 weeks, 5 days a week. Next tues will be starting Tamoxifen 20mg a day. I thank God every day! Mine was size 0.8 stage 1, 8 lymph nodes removed all neg. My heart goes out to everyone who is battleing this. May God touch each and every one of you. Your in my thoughts and prayers
Posts.Title: just found out i have IDC ! so scared ! jlynnbain1031 dmorgan2
